Franz Schubert

Eight Ländler, D 378

1816

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 4'

  • 1. B-flat major
  • 2. B-flat major
  • 3. B-flat major
  • 4. B-flat major
  • 5. B-flat major
  • 6. B-flat major
  • 7. B-flat major
  • 8. B-flat major

Other versions of these dances exist for solo violin as part of the eight Ländler (D 370) and the eleven Ländler (D 374).

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 74 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band I · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann
